comment: Smart Data Models - GovCT2 adapted to DTDL from smartdatamodels.org. Source: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/smart-data-models/dataModel.EnergyCIM/master/GovCT2/schema.json
description: Adapted from CIM data models. General governor model with frequency-dependent fuel flow limit.  This model is a modification of the GovCT1model in order to represent the frequency-dependent fuel flow limit of a specific gas turbine manufacturer.

contents.name: alternateName
contents.comment: An alternative name for this item

contents.name: areaServed
contents.comment: The geographic area where a service or offered item is provided

contents.name: aset
contents.comment: Acceleration limiter setpoint (Aset).  Unit = PU/sec.  Typical Value = 10. Default: 0.0

contents.name: dataProvider
contents.comment: A sequence of characters identifying the provider of the harmonised data entity.

contents.name: dateCreated
contents.comment: Entity creation timestamp. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: dateModified
contents.comment: Timestamp of the last modification of the entity. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: db
contents.comment: Speed governor dead band in per unit speed (db).  In the majority of applications, it is recommended that this value be set to zero.  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: description
contents.comment: A description of this item

contents.name: dm
contents.comment: Speed sensitivity coefficient (Dm).  Dm can represent either the variation of the engine power with the shaft speed or the variation of maximum power capability with shaft speed.  If it is positive it describes the falling slope of the engine speed verses power characteristic as speed increases. A slightly falling characteristic is typical for reciprocating engines and some aero-derivative turbines.  If it is negative the engine power is assumed to be unaffected by the shaft speed, but the maximum permissib

contents.name: flim1
contents.comment: Frequency threshold 1 (Flim1).  Unit = Hz.  Typical Value = 59. Default: 0.0

contents.name: flim10
contents.comment: Frequency threshold 10 (Flim10).  Unit = Hz.  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: flim2
contents.comment: Frequency threshold 2 (Flim2).  Unit = Hz.  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: flim3
contents.comment: Frequency threshold 3 (Flim3).  Unit = Hz.  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: flim4
contents.comment: Frequency threshold 4 (Flim4).  Unit = Hz.  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: flim5
contents.comment: Frequency threshold 5 (Flim5).  Unit = Hz.  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: flim6
contents.comment: Frequency threshold 6 (Flim6).  Unit = Hz.  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: flim7
contents.comment: Frequency threshold 7 (Flim7).  Unit = Hz.  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: flim8
contents.comment: Frequency threshold 8 (Flim8).  Unit = Hz.  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: flim9
contents.comment: Frequency threshold 9 (Flim9).  Unit = Hz.  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: ka
contents.comment: Acceleration limiter Gain (Ka).  Typical Value = 10. Default: 0.0

contents.name: kdgov
contents.comment: Governor derivative gain (Kdgov).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: kigov
contents.comment: Governor integral gain (Kigov).  Typical Value = 0.45. Default: 0.0

contents.name: kiload
contents.comment: Load limiter integral gain for PI controller (Kiload).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0.0

contents.name: kimw
contents.comment: Power controller (reset) gain (Kimw).  The default value of 0.01 corresponds to a reset time of 100 seconds.  A value of 0.001 corresponds to a relatively slow acting load controller.  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: kpgov
contents.comment: Governor proportional gain (Kpgov).  Typical Value = 4. Default: 0.0

contents.name: kpload
contents.comment: Load limiter proportional gain for PI controller (Kpload).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0.0

contents.name: kturb
contents.comment: Turbine gain (Kturb).  Typical Value = 1.9168. Default: 0.0

contents.name: ldref
contents.comment: Load limiter reference value (Ldref).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0.0

contents.name: maxerr
contents.comment: Maximum value for speed error signal (Maxerr).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0.0

contents.name: minerr
contents.comment: Minimum value for speed error signal (Minerr).  Typical Value = -1. Default: 0.0

contents.name: mwbase
contents.comment: Base for power values (MWbase) (> 0).  Unit = MW. Default: 0.0

contents.name: name
contents.comment: The name of this item.

contents.name: plim1
contents.comment: Power limit 1 (Plim1).  Typical Value = 0.8325. Default: 0.0

contents.name: plim10
contents.comment: Power limit 10 (Plim10).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: plim2
contents.comment: Power limit 2 (Plim2).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: plim3
contents.comment: Power limit 3 (Plim3).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: plim4
contents.comment: Power limit 4 (Plim4).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: plim5
contents.comment: Power limit 5 (Plim5).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: plim6
contents.comment: Power limit 6 (Plim6).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: plim7
contents.comment: Power limit 7 (Plim7).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: plim8
contents.comment: Power limit 8 (Plim8).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: plim9
contents.comment: Power Limit 9 (Plim9).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: prate
contents.comment: Ramp rate for frequency-dependent power limit (Prate).  Typical Value = 0.017. Default: 0.0

contents.name: r
contents.comment: Permanent droop (R).  Typical Value = 0.05. Default: 0.0

contents.name: rclose
contents.comment: Minimum valve closing rate (Rclose).  Unit = PU/sec.  Typical Value = -99. Default: 0.0

contents.name: rdown
contents.comment: Maximum rate of load limit decrease (Rdown).  Typical Value = -99. Default: 0.0

contents.name: ropen
contents.comment: Maximum valve opening rate (Ropen).  Unit = PU/sec.  Typical Value = 99. Default: 0.0

contents.name: rselect
contents.comment: Feedback signal for droop (Rselect).  Typical Value = electricalPower. Default: None

contents.name: rup
contents.comment: Maximum rate of load limit increase (Rup).  Typical Value = 99. Default: 0.0

contents.name: source
contents.comment: A sequence of characters giving the original source of the entity data as a URL. Recommended to be the fully qualified domain name of the source provider, or the URL to the source object.

contents.name: ta
contents.comment: Acceleration limiter time constant (Ta).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0

contents.name: tact
contents.comment: Actuator time constant (Tact).  Typical Value = 0.4. Default: 0

contents.name: tb
contents.comment: Turbine lag time constant (Tb).  Typical Value = 0.1. Default: 0

contents.name: tc
contents.comment: Turbine lead time constant (Tc).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0

contents.name: tdgov
contents.comment: Governor derivative controller time constant (Tdgov).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0

contents.name: teng
contents.comment: Transport time delay for diesel engine used in representing diesel engines where there is a small but measurable transport delay between a change in fuel flow setting and the development of torque (Teng).  Teng should be zero in all but special cases where this transport delay is of particular concern.  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0

contents.name: tfload
contents.comment: Load Limiter time constant (Tfload).  Typical Value = 3. Default: 0

contents.name: tpelec
contents.comment: Electrical power transducer time constant (Tpelec).  Typical Value = 2.5. Default: 0

contents.name: tsa
contents.comment: Temperature detection lead time constant (Tsa).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0

contents.name: tsb
contents.comment: Temperature detection lag time constant (Tsb).  Typical Value = 50. Default: 0

contents.name: vmax
contents.comment: Maximum valve position limit (Vmax).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0.0

contents.name: vmin
contents.comment: Minimum valve position limit (Vmin).  Typical Value = 0.175. Default: 0.0

contents.name: wfnl
contents.comment: No load fuel flow (Wfnl).  Typical Value = 0.187. Default: 0.0

contents.name: wfspd
contents.comment: Switch for fuel source characteristic to recognize that fuel flow, for a given fuel valve stroke, can be proportional to engine speed (Wfspd). true = fuel flow proportional to speed (for some gas turbines and diesel engines with positive displacement fuel injectors) false = fuel control system keeps fuel flow independent of engine speed. Typical Value = false. Default: False

contents.name: owner
contents.comment: A List containing a JSON encoded sequence of characters referencing the unique Ids of the owner(s)

contents.name: address
contents.comment: The mailing address
